long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will offer a series of tools for all the businesses which use teamgantt.com to manage their projects and tasks.

If you decide to create and use custom labels for each person in the company, you'll find out you are unable to hide the People section shown in the bottom Availability panel.

This becomes annoying, if you never use People section but only Labels, as you would need to over extend the Availability panel each and every time you navigate through their website.

This extension will let you toggle the People section very easily, just once, and it will remember the setting, so you won't have to lose time manually extend the panel each time you open Availability panel or navigate through their website because this will automatically hide the People section for you.
